title: BRIEF-Fitch Ratings Says India State Bank Consolidation No Fix For Near-Term Challenges
text:
BRIEF-Fitch Ratings Says India State Bank Consolidation No Fix For Near-Term Challenges

Stock Markets 43 minutes ago (Sep 11, 2019 12:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Fitch Ratings Says India State Bank Consolidation No Fix For Near-Term Challenges Sept 11 (Reuters) - * FITCH RATINGS SAYS INDIA STATE BANK CONSOLIDATION NO FIX FOR NEAR-TERM CHALLENGES * FITCH SAYS NEAR-TERM DOWNSIDE RISKS FOR INDIAN STATE BANKS INCLUDE DETERIORATING CREDIT QUALITY AND POTENTIAL CAPITAL SHORTFALLS * FITCH ON INDIAN STATE BANKS SAYS MORE EFFECTIVE RESOLUTION OF STRESSED ASSETS UNDER LESS FRAGMENTED BANKING SYSTEM IS EXPECTED TO BENEFIT SECTOR

BRIEF-Fitch Ratings Says India State Bank Consolidation No Fix For Near-Term Challenges
description: BRIEF-Fitch Ratings Says India State Bank Consolidation No Fix For Near-Term Challenges
